channel.title: Trial Introduction :: K-State Computational Core
channel.description: YouTube Video Resources Slides Video Script Greetings, and welcome to the trial course for the Computational Core program! My name is Russell Feldhausen, and am one of the instructors for this program. My contact information is shown here. My email address is russfeld@ksu.edu, and it is by far my preferred method of communication if you need to reach me directly. This trial course contains two modules from our CC 210: Fundamental Computer Programming Concepts course - the introductory module describing the content and the structure of the course, as well as the first module teaching how to write a “Hello World” program in the chosen programming language.
